merchant_purchase_order_id.description: This is the unique purchase order that the merchant identifies the inbound inventory by

jet_receipt_number.description: This is the unique identifier that Jet.com records for a receiving event

merchant_inbound_shipment_id.description: This is a unique merchant shipment identifier for a portion of a inbound purchase order ID that was received by Jet.com

jet_fulfillment_node_id.description: This is the Jet.com fulfillment node ID that the adjustment was made at

adjustment_date.description:
The date the inbound inventory adjustment occurred

		        	#Valid Values

            		The UTC time as follows 'yyyy'-'MM'-'dd'T'HH':'mm':'ss'.'fffffff''Z' for example 5PM eastern daylight time on Jan 1st 2015 would be '2015-01-01T21:00:00.0000000Z'

jet_received_item_id.description: the identifier used by jet.com to record the receiving event, this value was returned to the merchant in the inbound inventory receipt

jet_adjustment_item_id.description: the unique identifier used by jet.com to record this adjustement event

merchant_sku.description: the unique merchant identifier for the item quantity that was adjusted

quantity_adjusted.description: the total number of units that were adjusted by Jet.com into the inventory adjustment reason below

adjustment_reason.description: the status of the inventory that was adjusted
